If you're running low on dyes I can trade you for some colours I need, but it has to be before Summer comes and my next shipment arrives.

If you have 5 Yellow Dye I can give you 5 Purple Dye and 5 Green Dye.
q_maluspringseasonal.Complete: Thanks! I've been using yellow so much it's such a happy bright colour. \n\nHere you go, thanks for trading with me!
q_kieranspringseasonal.Title: Weeds for Rocks
q_kieranspringseasonal.Text:
Ah dang, Winter is over. Now that it's Spring I've got to clean up the campsite...

That means picking all these plants! Oh hey, you like picking plants and I have some shiny rocks.

If you can pick 200 Plant Fiber before Summer, I'll give you these 10 Crystal Geodes.
q_kieranspringseasonal.Complete: Ah, rad! This place is looking better. Here are those shiny rocks you wanted.
q_thornespringseasonal.Title: Springing Problem
q_thornespringseasonal.Text:
Over here! Good I caught you before you hopped away!

Now that Winter is over the bunnies have been eating so much! I'm almost hopping out!

If you can bring me 20 carrots before Summer, I can trade you for this Bunny Easter Crate.
q_thornespringseasonal.Complete: Thank you! Here's your Bunny Easter Crate, it's not much but maybe you'll get a rare colourful bunny?
q_robertspringseasonal.Title: Wood Worries
q_robertspringseasonal.Text: Say, think you cold help an old bear out? My paws just aren't what they used to be.\n\nNow that Summer is almost here I've got to do repairs but I'm all out of wood. If you can collect 100 Wood before Summer, I've got 1000 coins for you.
q_robertspringseasonal.Complete: Thanks, this wood will be very useful to have on paw. Here's your 1000 coins, you earned it.
q_jamessummerseasonal.Title: Eggs for Milk
q_jamessummerseasonal.Text:
My shipment of Milk came in but for some reason it's double what I ordered.

You can use it? Well if you'd like it I can trade you for it, but it has to be during the Summer or it'll go bad.

How about you give me 20 Chicken Eggs and I'll give you 10 Milk.
q_jamessummerseasonal.Complete: Thanks, I hope you put this Milk to good use.
q_franksummerseasonal.Title: Boards for Glass
q_franksummerseasonal.Text: Now that it's Summer everyone wants to build something. I have bear-ly enough wood to cover my orders.\n\nIf you're interested in a trade I've got 30 Glass I can give you for 20 Wooden Boards, but I need them before Fall.
q_franksummerseasonal.Complete: Thanks! If you have more Wooden Boards I've got some more Glass I can trade in a few days.
q_franksummerseasonal2.Title: Double the Trade
q_franksummerseasonal2.Text: I'm running short on Wooden Boards, are you interested in doing another trade?\n\nBring me 20 Wooden Boards before Summer is over and I've got 30 Glass for you.
q_franksummerseasonal2.Complete: Thanks! You've been a huge help, I could bear-ly manage without you.
q_beltransummerseasonal.Title: Great Geode Trade
q_beltransummerseasonal.Text:
I've seen you in the caves collecting geodes, if you have some extras I've got some ore to trade.

Bring me 20 Geodes and I'll give you 10 Silver Ore and 10 Copper Ore for them.

Sure you might get gold from your geodes, but you might get stone. If you want to trade, bring me the geodes before the end of Summer.
q_beltransummerseasonal.Complete: Great choice, here's your Copper and Silver. Wish me luck, I hope I find Gold.
q_jennasummerseasonal.Title: Bunny for Lemons
q_jennasummerseasonal.Text:
Looking for a little boost this Summer? I've got just the thing for you, Lemonade!

No coin? Hrm... how about a trade?

If you bring me, 1 White Bunny I've got 10 Lemonade for you!
q_jennasummerseasonal.Complete: Thanks this bunny is so cute! Here's your Lemonade, you can sell it or drink it for energy.
q_abbyfallseasonal.Title: Shrooms for Books
q_abbyfallseasonal.Text: Have you seen all these mushrooms popping up everywhere? I want to make a mushroom soup, but don't have enough.\n\nIf you have 20 Red Mushrooms, I can give you some of my decorative books.
q_abbyfallseasonal.Complete: Thanks, here you go one decorative book pile.
q_sadiefallseasonal.Title: Fish For Food
q_sadiefallseasonal.Text:
Isn't Fall just the best season? The colours are so beautiful.

Winter will be here soon though and we have to prepare, if you have any Fish let me know.

I need to buy all the Small Fish I can before Winter comes. If you have 15 Small Fish, I can give you this Seedmaker.
q_sadiefallseasonal.Complete: Thanks, here's the Seedmaker. When you place a flower or plant inside it'll turn it into seeds. I have no use for it.
q_sammyfallseasonal.Title: Sunflower Trade
q_sammyfallseasonal.Text:
Hey friend, in Fall there are so many new plants everywhere. I want to get my paws on all of them.

I am having trouble finding Sunflowers. I hear you can dry them and save their seeds for next year.

Could you bring me 10 Sunflowers before Winter, and I'll give you some premium seeds.
q_sammyfallseasonal.Complete: Wow thanks! I've got something special for you! This pack is 4 seeds in 1, when you harvest it you'll even get a seed back!
q_sammyfallseasonal2.Title: Sunflower Max Trade
q_sammyfallseasonal2.Text: Interested in another trade? I could sure use some more Sunflowers if you have them.\n\nIf you can bring me 20 Sunflowers before Winter arrives I can give you some more premium seeds.
q_sammyfallseasonal2.Complete: Here you go, 4 premium bundled seed packs! They're beautiful, especially in the Winter.
q_stonefallseasonal.Title: Feast for the Miners
q_stonefallseasonal.Text: Everyone has been working so hard to get the projects done before winter... I want to treat the miners to a large feast this fall!\n\nIf you have 1 Pumpkin Pies and 10 Vegetable Skewers I have some coin set aside for you!
q_stonefallseasonal.Complete: Thanks! The miners will be so happy! Here's your coin!
q_conradshipwreck.Title: Where are we?
q_conradshipwreck.Text: There you are, I was worried about you! The boat broke on the way here and our supplies washed away.\n\nWe're going to need to find materials on this island to fix the boat. 10 Wooden Boards should be enough.
q_conradshipwreck.Complete: Great I can start repairing the boat over the next couple days. We need to set up camp for the night.
q_conradshipwreck1.Title: Tent Time
q_conradshipwreck1.Text: To set up camp we're going to need 20 Cloth and 10 Rope.
q_conradshipwreck1.Complete: Give me a second and I'll set up the tents..\n\nAll done, the tents should keep us comfortable tonight. Here's a blueprint if you want to make more tents later.
q_conradshipwreck2.Title: Keep Warm
q_conradshipwreck2.Text: A fire would be great to keep us warm. Do you think you could make a campfire?
q_conradshipwreck2.Complete: This is great I'll set it up. I'll talk to you in the morning it's been a long day.
q_conradshipwreck3.Title: Lost At Sea
q_conradshipwreck3.Text: Oh no! What happened to our ship! The tide must have come in further than I thought last night and tore up our ship.\n\nNow what are we going to do? Maybe there is someone on the island that can build us a ship. Scout around and see if you can find any helpful paws.
q_conradshipwreck4.Title: Grumbling Tummy
q_conradshipwreck4.Text:
Did you manage to find any ship owners?

I didn't either, it looks like we may have to repair our ship best we can. We might be here awhile.

I suppose we're going to need some food to get us through the day. Think you can catch some fish for us?

I almost forgot, I found out this island is called Kozita, or cozy Kozita as some like to say.
q_conradshipwreck4.Complete: I searched the beaches and found the grill from our ship. If you want to set it up we can grill some fish tonight.\n\nI'm going to get working on the ship, I'll talk to you tomorrow.
q_conradshipwreck5a.Title: Rope You In
q_conradshipwreck5a.Text:
How was your sleep? The tents are no feather filled matresses but they aren't that bad.

I took a walk around and there are a few kind paws on this island. It looks like they're as stuck here as we are.

You didn't notice those huge thorns? They look familiar don't they? Almost like the ones we had in Florens when you showed up.

I'm going to start figuring out a way off this island. 

If you come across 50 Wood and 20 Rope before me come find me.
q_conradshipwreck5a.Complete:
You gathered these much quicker than I did, I've only got a couple twigs so far.

I found something really cool, I saw it once before, it's a Pineapple! Maybe we can grow these seeds?

As I've been repairing the ship, I've been working on making a raft and I'm all done!

This one is yours, to use it place it in your 'hotbar' then use it as you would any tool when you're in shallow waters.
q_conradshipwreck6.Title: Sweet Pineapple
q_conradshipwreck6.Text:
I've finished repairing the boat, I'm not sure how durable it'll be. We'll know when we test it.

Did you ever grow those seeds I gave you? With a bit of food we will be able to travel back to the mainland.

2 Pineapples and 2 Small Fish should be enough, when you have the food ready come find me and we can sail home.
q_conradshipwreck6.Complete: You got them grown, these are great! I've set up a sign next to the boat, when you want to go back to Florens let me know.\n\nAs long as our boat makes it back to Florens we will be able to come back here anytime.
q_conradshipwreck7.Title: Thorny Situation II
q_conradshipwreck7.Text:
If you want to stay on the island it seems they could use our help, don't worry about your crops or animals in Florens. 

Everything will be exactly the same as when we left, almost as if no time had passed.

I remember how much the thorns caused us problems in Florens. We could try helping out if we find the right paws to talk to. 

Check around the island for someone that might know how to remove them.
q_conradshipwreck7.Complete:
Well now.. who might you be? It's been quite some time since I've seen someone quite so...

How did you get here? Ah a note, it must have been sent by the miners on Rock Island.

Yes it really is named Rock Island, I wasn't the one who named it.
q_conradshipwreck8.Title: Mysterious Stranger
q_conradshipwreck8.Text:
Hello again, you're still here I see. That's ... refreshing. Most paws just pass right through without a care, you're different I see.

The thorns? Well they're here because of the corrupted earth. I've been holding it back but since I ran out of the right ingredients it's growing stronger every day.

Unless I can collect more Purple Mushrooms in time the thorns will consume this island. If you come across 10 do bring them to me why don't you.
q_conradshipwreck8.Complete:
You really came through on these, that's unexpected but welcomed.

I don't have much to give you but here's an outfit I was gifted that you may like.

Thank you for sticking around and providing aid. I'll update you when I have more information on our thorny situation.
q_conraddock.Title: Cosy Kozita Dock
q_conraddock.Text: I'll be building a dock over the next couple of days, can you could help me gather some of the supplies?\n\nI need 10 Large Wooden Board, 10 Wooden Boards and 50 Rope
q_conraddock.Complete: Thanks! I'll be working on it in the next couple of days and it should be ready soon!\n\nWith the leftover materials I had I also made you a decorative boat you can place, hope you like it!
q_conraddock2.Title: Kozita Sales
q_conraddock2.Text: With the new dock set up, I've also set up a sale bin. If you place items inside I'll take them to the mainland everyday at 18:00 to sell.\n\nI'll take a small fee of 5% to sell the items, so you'll make 95% of the sell price and won't have to open your shop in Florens.
q_cart.Title: Stuck On Land
q_cart.Text:
Who are you? How did you get to the island without getting wet?

How did I get here? I took my Kart off the beach and ended up hitting the water. 

Well my Kart broke and I'm afraid of swimming. Oh you don't know what a Kart is? 

I can show you if you can bring me some carrots.
q_cart.Complete: Ohh thanks I was getting hungry! You can take a look at my broken Kart, it's under those boxes over there. \n\nCan you believe I made it out of things I found!
q_cart1.Title: Smells Fishy
q_cart1.Text: Yeah I can make another one if I have the right materials. I'm a little tired though, maybe we can figure this out tomorrow?\n\nBy the way, those carrots are great but fish are tastier... I might be able to think a bit better with a Small Fish before my nap.
q_cart1.Complete: Thanks come see me tomorrow and I'll tell you what I need to build a kart.
q_cart2.Title: Kart You Not!
q_cart2.Text: Hey! It's you the food bringer! I can definitely make you a kart, let me think what I need.\n\nI'll need 8 Wooden Boards, 4 Stone Blocks and some rope to tie it all together, 10 Rope should do it.
q_cart2.Complete:
You're back! I guess you really want that Kart huh?

Give me a minute to assemble it....

One more board here... anndd.....

DONE! One Kart! You use it like any tool, when you're inside click 'F' to go faster, 'Q' to spin out and 'Space' to jump.
q_sanctuary.Title: Sanctuary Starter
q_sanctuary.Text:
Hello! You must be new here! Oh all this? Before the thorns grew in I was starting up an animal sanctuary with some other helpful paws.

The goal is to create an animal sanctuary without fences that are beautiful homes filled with the creatures favourite foods.

I haven't been able to finish though! I'm afraid I'll never finish without help.

I'm asking anyone that can lend a paw to fill any items in the boxes under the signs I've placed around the sanctuary.

If you can fill the box with the items and the creatures I'll give you a great reward!
0.Tip: Picking up Wood and Rocks from the ground doesn't take energy.\r
2.Tip: Picking plant fiber from bushes doesn't take energy.\r
3.Tip: If you don't harvest a home grown plant, it wont die. But be careful, the soil will dissappear.
4.Tip: When it rains you don't need to water your crops.\r
5.Tip: You can break a geode open at an anvil when holding it.\r
6.Tip: You can tame bunnies and cats in the wild.\r
7.Tip: There are more than 250 appearance items to collect.\r
8.Tip: If you pass out there is no penalty.\r
9.Tip: You can take a screenshot by clicking \"F11\" to enter your drone camera.
10.Tip: Cooked items like grilled fish restore energy when eaten. \r
11.Tip: You can do a dance emote by clicking \"K\".
12.Tip: You can do a dab emote by clicking \"J\".
13.Tip: You can do a wow emote by clicking \"O\".
15.Tip: There's a secret inside every shooting star.\r
16.Tip: Different workstations are used to craft different items. \r
17.Tip: You can craft items in your crafting menu by clicking \"T\".
18.Tip: Your grandparents are having a great time travelling the world. \r
19.Tip: Frank manages all the construction work in town, including upgrades.
20.Tip: You can toggle \"Grid Placement\" by holding Alt or going into your settings.
21.Tip: You can link your twitch account in the settings menu. Any viewers that type in chat for the last 6 minutes will appear as customers in your shop.\r
22.Tip: You can play offline or online with up to 4 people.\r
23.Tip: You can tame and raise animals including rabbits and chicks.\r
24.Tip: You can change any of the bound keys in the control settings in the main menu \"esc\".
25.Tip: You can have more precision in the Item Shifter by holding the \"ALT\" button, or move it faster with \"SHIFT\".
26.Tip: If you haven't yet, you should try pressing the \">\" key

inn_1.Description: An Inn where you can enjoy a nice meal.

barn_3.Name: Barn 3
barn_3.Description: An upgraded barn that can hold 9 animals in total.

shop_5.Description: Upgrade your shop size to attract more customers and sell more.

treefarm_1.Description: Comission the tree farm for Bruce. Once built they will send you small daily wood shipments.
u_ownacave.Name: Waterfall Cave
u_ownacave.Description: Purchase the rights to the cave under the waterfall.
u_20percentcave.Name: Miners Contract
u_20percentcave.Description: Hire the miners services for 20% of the findings in your Waterfall Cave. Receive 10 coal and 2 geodes a day.
u_moregeodescave.Name: Miners Contract II
u_moregeodescave.Description: Invest in the miners tools. Receive an additional 8 Geodes and 1 Crystal Geode for your investment.\n\nTotal of 10 Coal, 10 Geodes and 1 Crystal Geode a day.
u_moregeodescave2.Name: Miners Contract III
u_moregeodescave2.Description: Invest in the miners tools. Receive an additional 5 Geodes and 4 Crystal Geodes every day.\n\nTotal of 10 Coal, 15 Geodes and 5 Crystal Geodes a day.
u_moregeodescave3.Name: Miners Contract IIII
u_moregeodescave3.Description: Invest in the miners equipment. Receive an additional 5 Geodes and 10 Crystal Geodes every day.\n\nTotal of 10 Coal, 20 Geodes and 15 Crystal Geodes a day.

discountbin_1.Description: Items placed in this bin will sell at the end of day at half price. (50%)

u_homechest2.Description: A second chest for your home.

discountbin_2.Description: Items placed in this bin will sell at the end of day at a sale price. (55%)

horsestable.Name: Horse Stable
horsestable.Description: A stable to raise a horse.
shipupgrade.Name: Ship Upgrade
shipupgrade.Description: Upgrade Conrad's ship to venture out to a distant island with new adventures and exotic creatures.
housedeed_5.Name: Small Castle
housedeed_5.Description: This small castle features spacious rooms with blueprints for all your castle furniture needs. You will also receive a stone fox mount that lives on the property.
u_bettertoolspickaxe.Name: Silver Pickaxe
u_bettertoolspickaxe.Description: With this upgrade you'll be able to craft your very own Silver Pickaxe. This pickaxe will do twice as much damage as the Stone Pickaxe.
u_bettertools2pickaxe.Name: Gold Pickaxe
u_bettertools2pickaxe.Description: With this upgrade you'll be able to craft your very own Gold Pickaxe. This pickaxe will do 3 times the damage as the Stone Pickaxe.
u_bettertoolsaxe.Name: Silver Axe
u_bettertoolsaxe.Description: With this upgrade you'll be able to craft your very own Silver Axe. This axe will do twice as much damage as the Stone Axe.
u_bettertools2axe.Name: Gold Axe
u_bettertools2axe.Description: With this upgrade you'll be able to craft your very own Gold Axe. This axe will do 3 times the damage as the Stone Axe.
u_bettertoolsfishing.Name: Silver Fishing Pole
u_bettertoolsfishing.Description: With this upgrade you'll be able to craft your very own Silver Fishing Pole. This fishing pole will attract better fishes and attract them even faster.
u_bettertools2fishing.Name: Gold Fishing Pole
u_bettertools2fishing.Description: With this upgrade you'll be able to craft your very own Gold Fishing Pole. This fishing pole will attract better fishes and attract them even faster.
u_assistant.Name: Assistant For Hire
u_assistant.Description: A Sign to send an assistant request installed right behind your shop table.
u_furnitureblueprint.Name: Blueprint Vendor
u_furnitureblueprint.Description: A shop to purchase blueprints to unlock new furniture recipes.

u_alphabetworkbench.Description: Unlock the blueprint for the Alphabet Workbench.
u_fencesquare.Name: Square Fence Blueprint
u_fencepicket.Name: Picket Fence Blueprint

u_foundation_glass.Description: Unlock the blueprint for a Glass Foundation.
u_wall_wdoor_glass.Name: Glass Wall with Door
u_wall_wdoor_glass.Description: Unlock the blueprint for a Glass Wall with Door.
u_wall_glass.Name: Glass Wall
u_wall_glass.Description: Unlock the blueprint for a Glass Wall.
u_ramp_glass.Name: Glass Ramp
u_ramp_glass.Description: Unlock the blueprint for a Glass Ramp.
u_cornerwall_glass.Name: Corner Glass Wall
u_cornerwall_glass.Description: Unlock the blueprint for the Corner Glass Wall.
u_cornerwall_plaster.Name: Corner Plaster
u_cornerwall_plaster.Description: Unlock the blueprint for the Corner Plaster Wall.
u_rampcurvedin.Name: Ramp Curved In
u_rampcurvedin.Description: Unlock the blueprint for the Corner Plaster Wall.
u_rampcurvedout.Name: Ramp Curved Out
u_rampcurvedout.Description: Unlock the blueprint for the Corner Plaster Wall.
u_upgradesierrashop.Name: Upgrade Sierra's Shop
u_upgradesierrashop.Description: Upgrade Sierra's shop. They will start selling new items and will send you a daily shipment of 50 Plant Fiber a day for your investment.
u_upgradesierrashop2.Name: Increase Daily Plant Fiber
u_upgradesierrashop2.Description: Create a work order for Sierra to start sending you a total of 200 Plant Fiber a day.

u_fishingdelivery.Name: Fish Delivery
u_fishingdelivery.Description: Invest in the fishing dock, receive 3 Small Fish a day.
u_fishingdelivery2.Name: More Fish Delivery
u_fishingdelivery2.Description: Invest in the fishing dock, receive an extra 2 Small Fish a day, one red and 1 blue snapper.\n\nFor a total of: 5 Small Fish a day, 1 red and 1 blue snapper.
u_fishingdelivery3.Name: Even More Fish Delivery
u_fishingdelivery3.Description: Invest in the fishing dock, receive an extra 3 Small Fish a day, one red and 1 blue snapper.\n\nFor a total of: 8 Small Fish a day, 2 red and 2 blue snappers.
u_modernbw.Name: Modern Furniture Set
u_modernbw.Description: A furniture workbench that unlocks 14 blueprints for Modern furniture set.
u_blackgalaxy.Name: Black Galaxy Furniture Set
u_blackgalaxy.Description: A furniture workbench that unlocks 13 blueprints for the Black Galaxy furniture set.
u_pinkgalaxy.Name: Pink Galaxy Furniture Set
u_pinkgalaxy.Description: A furniture workbench that unlocks 13 blueprints for the Pink Galaxy furniture set.
u_rainbowpaw.Name: Rainbow Paw Furniture Set

u_colourfulsplatter.Name: Splatter Furniture Set

u_candle.Name: Candle Workbench
u_candle.Description: A workbench to craft small candles.
u_candlemed.Name: Medium Candle Workbench
u_candlemed.Description: Unlock the recipes to craft medium candles.
u_candlelrg.Name: Large Candle Workbench
u_candlelrg.Description: Unlock the recipes to craft large candles.
u_sellprices.Name: Sell Price Book
u_sellprices.Description: With this upgrade you'll see how much a table of goods will sell for.

u_overpass.Description: Unlock the blueprint for the overpass.

u_farmdecorations.Name: Farm Decorations
u_farmdecorations.Description: Unlock blueprints for some farm decorations.
u_toiletbathtub.Name: Toilet and Bathtub Blueprints
u_toiletbathtub.Description: Unlock toilet and bathtub decoration blueprints.
u_propsdecorations.Name: Props Blueprints
u_propsdecorations.Description: Unlock several blueprints to craft decorations including coin pile, book piles, pineapple decorations and more.
u_decorationstation.Name: Decoration Station Blueprint
u_decorationstation.Description: Unlock the Decoration Station, to craft decorative cakes.
u_dungeonworkbench.Name: Dungeon Workbench Blueprint

u_custompaintings.Description: Unlock the blueprints to craft carpets and paintings that can be painted with any wall paintbrush.

u_house2.Description: Purchase this one bedroom house for 5000 coin.
u_house3.Name: House 3
u_house3.Description: Purchase this one bedroom house for 5000 coin.
u_house4.Name: House 4
u_house4.Description: Purchase this one bedroom house for 5000 coin.
u_piratehouse.Name: Pirate House
u_piratehouse.Description: Purchase a house fit for a pirate. Unlocks more tables with goods to trade.
u_marleydogbed.Name: Plush Dog Bed Blueprint
u_marleydogbed.Description: Purchase the blueprint for a plush dog bed.
u_supershed.Name: Super Shed
u_supershed.Description: Purchase a small shed that can hold 40 items. Can be painted with pastel colours.
u_tamingwand.Name: Taming Wand
u_tamingwand.Description: Purchase a blueprint to learn how to make a special wand to tame the dungeon monsters on the first few levels.
u_icetamingwand.Name: Ice Taming Wand
u_icetamingwand.Description: Purchase a blueprint to learn how to make a special wand to tame the dungeon monsters on the ice levels.
